column5: Anybody been up there this year? If so, how has it been, any reports or advice would be appreciated. I have the outpost cabin booked for August, so if anyone has stayed there in past also, fill me in if you have a chance.Thanks,Doug
Hey Doug, I'll be going in August too. 11th. Fishing will be great. Always is.
Had a friend who lives near Kenora,on LOTW, go there a couple years ago and said it was some of the best fishing he's ever had. Thought about going there myself. Good luck, Slushfish

Thats the week we will be there 3M. Do you venture off to the other side of lake often? Thats where we will be, look for a blue and white Lowe boat on outpost end, and say hi! Good luck, and hope to see you there. Any tips?
Leave the outpost cabin clean, we'll be there on August 25th. Either of you guys plan to fish the bush lakes?
